channel.title: Gay Quiz
channel.description: OK here is my Gay Quiz. Make a new text file anywhere in the program files of your computer. Copy and paste this into there. [code]@echo off title menu :menu echo. Are You Gay? echo. Y= Yes I Am Gay echo. N= No I Am Not Gay echo. ?= I Dont Know set /p c=Option_ if %c%==Y goto Y if %c%== y goto Y if %c%== N goto N if %c%== n goto N if %c%== ? goto ? pause goto Y set :Y title Yes cls echo YOU ARE SO TOTALLY GAY!!!! YOU HOMOSEXUAL GET OFF MY echo QUIZ!!!!!! echo. echo. pause goto menu goto N :N title No cls echo SWEET!!!! FINALLY SOMEONE WHO ISNT GAY LIKE echo EVERYBODY ELSE!!!!!! or are you.....???? echo. echo. pause goto menu goto ? :? title I Dont Know cls echo Hmmmm.... You're Probably Gay And Just Not Admitting It..... echo. echo. pause goto menu[/code] and then change that into a .bat file. HAVE FUN!!!!

item.title: Gay Quiz
item.dc:creator: @this_sucks this sucks
item.description:
@this_sucks wrote:

OK here is my Gay Quiz. Make a new text file anywhere in the program files of your computer. Copy and paste this into there. @echo off title menu :menu echo. Are You Gay? echo. Y= Yes I Am Gay echo. N= No I Am Not Gay echo. ?= I Dont Know set /p c=Option_ if %c%==Y goto Y if %c%== y goto Y if %c%== N goto N if %c%== n goto N if %c%== ? goto ? pause goto Y set :Y title Yes cls echo YOU ARE SO TOTALLY GAY!!!! YOU HOMOSEXUAL GET OFF MY echo QUIZ!!!!!! echo. echo. pause goto menu goto N :N title No cls echo SWEET!!!! FINALLY SOMEONE WHO ISNT GAY LIKE echo EVERYBODY ELSE!!!!!! or are you.....???? echo. echo. pause goto menu goto ? :? title I Dont Know cls echo Hmmmm.... You're Probably Gay And Just Not Admitting It..... echo. echo. pause goto menu and then change that into a .bat file. HAVE FUN!!!
